text.div:
Narrativa gerada: ValueSet vendor-codes-vs

Este conjunto de valores inclui códigos baseados nas seguintes regras:

  • Incluir todos os códigos definidos em https://developer.apple.com/documentation/healthkit
  • Incluir todos os códigos definidos em https://dev.fitbit.com/build/reference/web-api
  • Incluir todos os códigos definidos em https://developer.garmin.com/health-api
  • Incluir todos os códigos definidos em https://www.polaraccesslink.com/v3
  • Incluir todos os códigos definidos em https://cloud.ouraring.com/v2/usercollection

name: VendorCodesVS
title: Vendor Proprietary Wearable Device Codes
description: Comprehensive set of proprietary codes from major wearable device vendors (Apple HealthKit, Fitbit, Garmin, Polar, Oura Ring). Used as source ValueSet in ConceptMap for translating vendor-specific codes to LOINC standard terminology. Addresses critical interoperability gap: 0% vendor LOINC adoption documented across 11 major vendors.
copyright: Vendor codes are proprietary to their respective organizations. This ValueSet documents them for interoperability purposes only.
